mapper.select: SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CORP_NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.RESPONSIBILITY , EMP.QUALIFICATION , EMP.PREFERENTIAL , EMP.SALARY , EMP.BENEFITS , EMP.INTRODUCE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , EMP.DEADLINE , CORP.COMPANY_NAME , CORP.COMPANY_ADDRESS , CORP.LOGO , CORP.THUMB , JOB.TYPE FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON EMP.CORP_NO = CORP.NO JOIN JOB_CATE JOB ON EMP.CATEGORY = JOB.NO WHERE EMP.NO = #{no}

SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , CORP.COMPANY_NAME , CORP.THUMB FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON EMP.CORP_NO = CORP.NO WHERE EMP.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND EMP.DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYMENT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT NO , MEMBER_NO , EMP_NO FROM APPLY WHERE NO = #{value}

SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , CORP.COMPANY_NAME , CORP.THUMB FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON EMP.CORP_NO = CORP.NO WHERE EMP.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND LOWER(TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${keyword}%')
AND EMP.DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY EMP.NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYMENT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND LOWER(TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${keyword}%')
AND DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , CORP.COMPANY_NAME , CORP.THUMB FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON CORP.NO = EMP.CORP_NO JOIN JOB_CATE JOB ON JOB.NO = EMP.CATEGORY WHERE EMP.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND EMP.CATEGORY = #{value} AND EMP.DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY EMP.NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYMENT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND CATEGORY = #{value} AND DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
